page.title: 05Home Life, New Galloway
page.content: The average family size is 2.5 children, and, in general the children's ages are relatively close together. Very few of the younger families are without domestic pets. All members of the community have a pride in their homes and gardens. For heating and cooking they use electricity, coal, oil and bottled gas(there is no piped gas in the area) It is mainly a simple way of life with few worries,although 30%are concerned about the "acid rain"effect. The parents and grandparents are very interested in their children's education. 50% of the adults work locally, 15% are self-employed and the remaining 35% either work in Castle Douglas, our nearest town, which is 14 Kilometres away or are in employment away from home.
